from "../../img/download.svg"; const Sanphamdienthoai = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const res = await Axios.get(`http://localhost:3005/`); setData(res.data); }catch (err){ console.log(err); } }; fetchData(); }, []) const ok = [ { id_danhmuc: 1, id_tensanpham: '1', danhmuc: 'Apple', }, { id_danhmuc: 2,
